```{r setup}
library(polySimIBD)
```


```{r}
set.seed(1)
# define parameters
pos <- seq(1,1e3,5e2)
N <- 10
m <- 0.5
rho <- 1e-3
mean_coi <- 3
tlim = 1e3

start <- Sys.time()
swf <- sim_structured_WF(pos = pos,
                         N = N, 
                         m = m,
                         rho = rho, 
                         mean_coi = mean_coi,
                         tlim = tlim
                         )

# ARG <- get_ARG(swf, nodes = c(1,3))
end <- Sys.time()
end-start

ARG <- get_ARG(swf, nodes = c(1,2,3,4))
ARG
plot_coalescence_trees(ARG, loci = 1,  nodes = c(1,2,3,4))

layer_mutations_on_ARG(mutationrate = 10, ARG)



```
